text: Stewart Sanders Adams (1923 â€“ 30 January 2019) was a British chemist. He was known for creating ibuprofen in the early 1960s.University of Birmingham Adams died aged 95 at the Queen's Medical Centre in Nottingham from pneumonia on 30 January 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Boots * Chemistry in your cupboard - Royal Society of Chemistry * BBC 2006 * The ibuprofen inventor Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:British chemists Category:British inventors Category:People from Nottingham
title: Stewart Adams
